HttpAuth

Authorization HttpAuth is the foundation authorization object and is used as base class by HttpDirectory and HttpLocation. More...

Authorization HttpAuth is the foundation authorization object and is used as base class by HttpDirectory and HttpLocation.

It stores the authorization configuration information required to determine if a client request should be permitted access to a given resource.

API Stability:
Evolving
